title: Internship at Linoflap
text: She completed an internship at Linoflap Technology Philippines Inc. as a React JS Developer, where she refined the company website, maintained an existing system, and initiated a new project from scratch, and performed API integrations. During her internship, she explored various tech stacks including React, Next.js, TypeScript, MUI, Shadcn, and Tailwind CSS. She was offered an opportunity for absorption into the company.
